welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Grand Turk, the charming jewel of the Turks and Caicos Islands! Known for its turquoise waters and friendly locals, we invite you to explore and experience all the beauty and culture this city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Grand Turk Island Airport serves both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: A separate terminal for private and chartered flights is available at Grand Turk Island Airport.

wifi.note: Passengers can access complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Salt Cay Airport serves all commercial flights and is equipped with basic amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at South Caicos Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
